Articles.Content: so recently i have landed a base on the mun and i was wondering what kinds of epic mun bases the KSP community create. so basically the challenge is to create the most epic mun base you can and post a picture of it! you can use mods (obviously) but you can't do anything like go in and change the files of the game or of the mods you use to make it easier to make it lift off the pad, land your base on the mun, etc. also i would love to see mun bases that have function as well. like the mun base i just made, it has fully rechargeable ion engines so it can take off the surface, go into orbit, and land on a completely different part of the mun. i look forward to seeing what you can create
Well, this is semi-old, but I launched it on my Mun Launch Vehicle.

This munbase was one of the first things I did when I bought v0.15:

My friend wanted to name it the Exodus Project, and it sort of stuck. It consists of:

- 4 habitation modules

- 2 cargo stores

- A power array, with 4 solar generators and a nuclear power generator nestled in the middle

- A Solar Rover (which my friend destroyed before I took this photo)

I used Nova's BACE Construction pack and Yougi87's Solar Rover mod for the munbase, and the Kosmos Angara URL mod to get these up to the Mun.

I don't think BACE supports EVA; it would've been really cool to see some Kerbals walking there!
